summary: A 12th-century knight-errant wanders the world fighting injustice and is accompanied by his faithful friends Crispin and Goliath.
cast: Sergio Peris-Mencheta|Natasha Yarovenko|Asier Etxeandia|Emilio Buale|Natalia Rodríguez|Gary Piquer|Carmen Montero|Roberto Álvarez|Alejandro Naranjo|Francisco Merino|Ramón Langa|Adrián Lamana|Luis Fernando Alvés|Jon Bermúdez|Jennifer Rope|Xabier Murua|Alejandro Jornet|Eduardo Torroja|Man Martínez|Andrea Masulli|Antonio Chamizo|Jorge Galeano
keywords: man tied up|saved from execution|beheading|chopping block|sword and sorcery
title: Capitán Trueno y el Santo Grial
